newsitem.title: USA: New Paradigm revises Q1 loss to $0.39/shr.
newsitem.headline: New Paradigm revises Q1 loss to $0.39/shr.

text.p: New Paradigm Software Corp said Thursday it is switching $180,000 in revenues originally slotted for the first quarter to the second quarter, increasing the net loss for the first quarter to $948,579, or $0.39 a share.
The first quarter ended June 30. The company at that time reported a net loss of $768,579, or $0.31 a share. The second quarter is to end September 30.
The transfer was from the revenues recognized from its license to Transquest Information Solutions, a joint venture between AT&T Corp and Delta Air Lines Inc.
The change was made based on advice from New Paradigm's external accountants, who said the proper quarter for recognizing these revenues falls in the second quarter, the company said.
